entry.tran: 羽毛似的;羽状的;轻薄的;绒绒的
entry.def: If something is feathery, it has an edge divided into a lot of thin parts so that it looks soft.

example.ex: The foliage was soft and feathery.
example.tran: 叶子如羽毛般轻软柔和。

entry.def: Feathery is used to describe things that are soft and light.

example.ex: ...flurries of small, feathery flakes of snow.
example.tran: 飘洒着轻柔小雪花的阵雪
